name: MKRoute
desc: A single route between a requested start and end point.

items.name: var steps: [MKRoute.Step]
items.desc: The array of steps that comprise the overall route.

items.name: class MKRoute.Step
items.desc: One portion of an overall route.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name assigned to the route.

items.name: var advisoryNotices: [String]
items.desc: An array of advisory notice strings for the route.

items.name: var expectedTravelTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The expected travel time in seconds.
